author: Warner Todd Huston, Warner Todd Huston
title: Alec Baldwin to Trump Supporters: 'Don’t Bother Voting. Stay Home'
description: Left-wing actor Alec Baldwin took to Twitter on Friday and told supporters of President Donald Trump to "just stay home" on Election Day.
content:
Left-wing actor Alec Baldwin took to Twitter on Friday and told supporters of President Donald Trump to “just stay home” on Election Day.
“I’ve got some voting advice for many of you struggling Trump voters. I picked it up from Trump himself,” Baldwin blovia… [+1629 chars]
